HOME.TITLE: A conference for DEVELOPERS By DEVELOPERS
HOME.NAME: Home

SPEAKERS.NAME: Stephen Pope
SPEAKERS.TITLE: Senior Developer
SPEAKERS.TOPIC: Sitecore is not an island. Let's build some bridges and start using cross channel data the smart way

SPEAKERS.NAME: Jens Mikkelsen
SPEAKERS.TITLE: Sitecore MVP
SPEAKERS.TOPIC: Jens will share valuable knowledge and tips, which he has acquired whilst salvaging Sitecore solution with serious performance issue

SPEAKERS.NAME: Emil Okkels Klein
SPEAKERS.TITLE: Senior Consultant
SPEAKERS.TOPIC: Emil is a straightforward, hands-on expert, and will dive into the murky underworld of Sitecore deployment and dev ops

SPEAKERS.NAME: Martina Welander
SPEAKERS.TITLE: Technical Consulting Engineer
SPEAKERS.TOPIC: SPEAK. The why, when and how

SPEAKERS.NAME: Lasse Rasch
SPEAKERS.TITLE: Technical Architect
SPEAKERS.TOPIC: Lasse is a respected Sitecore expert who will share his hands-on experience with the experience platform

SPEAKERS.NAME: Todd Mitchell
SPEAKERS.TITLE: Technical Product Owner
SPEAKERS.TOPIC: How do you give everybody a piece of the experience? Insights and technical options you need to know about

SPEAKERS.NAME: Mike Edwards
SPEAKERS.TITLE: Founder/Sitecore MVP
SPEAKERS.TOPIC: A presentation on my experiences of running an open source project in the Sitecore community. The highs, the lows, the problems and the unexpected and what you might need to think about if you want to start and open source project

SPEAKERS.NAME: Robbert Hock
SPEAKERS.TITLE: Sitecore MVP / Sitecore User Group NL
SPEAKERS.TOPIC: Still many developers don't use Sitecore Rocks in their daily routine. In this session I will show how to get more out of Sitecore Rocks. I will show you how to speed up your development time with Sitecore, show you the various possibilities of Sitecore Rocks and give you valuable tips & tricks on using Sitecore Rocks in your daily routine and while developing SPEAK applications.
